title: The Received Allocations Might Not Be the Expected Ones.
content:
**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `3161944`.

![Image 70: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `d12a86a0dc8ff02043d00b6f60b0a1823c08d4f3`. The client provided the following explanation:

> The contract is now checking to make sure that the total supply is not less than the sum of the expected allocations.

![Image 71: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `d12a86a0dc8ff02043d00b6f60b0a1823c08d4f3`. The client provided the following explanation:

> The contract is now checking to make sure that the total supply is not less than the sum of the expected allocations.

**File(s) affected:**`SapTestToken.sol`

**Description:** The`initialize()`function mints the amount of`_totalSupply`. However, there is no guarantee that it is the sum of all the expected allocations(1B tokens). If`_totalSupply`is less than the sum of all allocations, the vesting schedules will be created with amounts that can never be fully claimed. If`_totalSupply`is greater than 1B, the excess tokens will be minted to the Gnosis Safe but won't be part of any vesting schedule.

**Recommendation:** Make sure that `_totalSupply` is equal to the sum of all the expected allocations. In case, it should be greater, modify the contract to reflect that and update the documentation.
